api

Class Alogrithm

  • java.lang.Object
    • api.Alogrithm

  • public class Alogrithm
extends java.lang.Object
    The alogrithm which can calculate the shortest path between two cities. which take in:
    • a start city
    • an end city
    • the result of the algorithm
    • the optimal distance of the result

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Alogrithm(api.Vertex start, api.Vertex end, java.util.HashSet<api.Vertex> set)
      instantiates a start vertex and end vertex and takes a hashset of all vertices and calculate the path then store the result and the optimal distance
